summary:
Bodyslide Slider Set for NorthGirl Outfit, this allows you to make the outfit fit any of the UNP Bodies such as UNP, UNPB, All Sevenbase Variations...There are about 50 bodies in the Universal UNP Bodyslide and there are a lot of morphs to boot.
This has sliders for all 4 colors of NorthGirl Armor and a few extra replacers.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75722-0-1464122878.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75722-0-1464124796.jpg[/img]
This is a UUNP Slider Set for [color=#0066cc][u]Northgirl Armor UNP and the Retexture from clethcleth and Gamwich[/u][u][color=#0066cc]a[/color][/u][/color] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1621400][u][color=#0066cc]anka01[/color][/u][/url][/center]
[/size]
The permissions were obtained for Ousnius and I (Gamefever) to produce Slider Sets for her Armors for Nexus Release last Summer....Sorry but uh I had classes and stuff so I only just got around to it but thankfully due to some Bodyslide Updates from Ousnius the conversion was much easier than it would have been last season.



[size=4][center][u]Description, work done[/u]....[/center][/size]
All Color Options are supported.
Colors are Black, Red, White, and Chainmail.

I added 4 additional options for each color that can replace the Jumper (chest slot 32 normally)
The extra bodyslide options are contained in there own Group.
These include the Jumper, Trousers, Belt, and Leg Straps...They occupy slot 32 and replace the jumper of their color in the Games ESP...This may be helpful for some people that would prefer to have more item slots available rather than occupied by so many parts...Perhaps you will use those slots for some other mod out there.
Its optional, don't use the optional if you don't like the result durr.

Comes only in HDT: Meaning the Armor has full physics for Breast, Butt, and Belly bounce.  This will work with mods that introduce pregnancy to the game.
Can be used with Bodyslide Outfit Studio to create any UNP body variant with a button click.
The Parts have been weight painted to the UUNP Body.
This means that your other UUNP Conversions should work rather well and be quite pleasing when you mix and match parts from other slider sets.

Provided a [u][size=4]Lazyboy Version[/size][/u]: Don't know a thing about Bodyslide? Well no problem, if you have mastered installation with Nexus Mod Manager you can install Bodyslide UUNP Morphs Pluggin from Bodyslide Outfit Studio with that you can morph the outfit in game and in real time to suit your needs.  You no longer have to miss out on what all the fuss is about with Bodyslide.  Download yours today.

Version 1.03 LazyBoy NorthGirl contains ESP.
Description: This changes slot data of Trousers, Fur Collar, and Fur Belt so that the User has an easier time mixing and matching outfit parts from other UUNP Slider Sets found on Nexus.  I though it was a good move for compatibility to create your own nice outfit in game so I went ahead and made this edit available as the main file.
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75722-0-1464126650.jpg[/img]
Example of how well the parts mix and match in game with other UUNP Slider Sets


[size=4]Requires[/size]
NorthGirl Armor [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38053/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38053/[/url]
BodySlide and Outfit Studio: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/][u][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/color][/u][/url]
XPMS Extended: [u][color=#0066cc]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/[/color][/u]


[u][size=4]Known Issues[/size][/u]
The Knit Sweater may have some clipping with extreme sliders


[b]Want more sliders by [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977][u][b][color=#0066cc]Gamefever[/color][/b][/u][/url][b]? Go here
[/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977/][u][size=2]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2205977/[/size][/u][/url][size=2]?

Remodeled Armor for UUNP Bodyslide HDT

author: Gamefever

files.name: NorthGirl Chain Pants Update
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Trouser Bodyslide Generation Error
Trousers Can take a TRI file now
Scary Issues resolved, Added LazyBoy Version for easy installation and use by newer modders or those that dont want to fuss with external programs
Found that Chain Trouser was not set to correct Output File Folder Path and corrected it

files.name: LazyBoy ChainTrouser Update
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Trouser Bodyslide Generation Error
Trousers Can take a TRI file now
Scary Issues resolved, Added LazyBoy Version for easy installation and use by newer modders or those that dont want to fuss with external programs
Found that Chain Trouser was not set to correct Output File Folder Path and corrected it
